oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Daniel Rothwell and Thomas Maupin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Daniel Rothwell (seated, with banjo) sings while Thomas Maupin teaches young audience members the basic steps of buckdancing at the opening reception for the Tradition: Tennessee Lives and Legacies exhibit at the downtown Nashville Public Library, 2012.

Maupin is a 2011 Tennessee Folklife Heritage Award recipient. Dean Dixon was contracted by the TAC to handle photographic duties for this project. Robert Cogswell, director of TAC's Folklife Program, provided text for the book and exhibit project.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Maupin, Thomas; Case, Jackie; Rothwell, Daniel; Rothwell, Dan; Bland, Jay
